bibl.title: Achilles in Locri: P. Oxy. 3876. frr. 37-77.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVII, 3876, frr. 37-77. Reconstructs the narrative account of Achilles' death and funeral, possibly addressed to an audience in Locri. Draws attention to parallels with frr. 1-26, telling the story of Meleager's death. - Pp. 164-165: Appendix: Memnon, Achilles, and the Psychostasia.
GARNER Richard, Achilles in Locri: P. Oxy. 3876. frr. 37-77.
